chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Queen Alliandre Maritha Kigarin, p. 22 (19)—Blessed of the Light, Queen of Ghealdan. She gives her jewelry to Masema so he does not ask for anything more than that from her. She is the fourth person to sit on the throne in six months. See also Ellizelle; Johanin; Teresia.
